name: Martian Base VR
description:
Martian Base VR is a virtual reality project made in Unity that allows users to explore freely in a non-linear manner what life would be like living as a colonist on Mars by exploring their home base and completing tasks along the way. This project is intended to be speculative in nature with some basis in current understandings of life on Mars for humans.

Developed by: Taetum Knebel, Chris Austin, Grant Cuyler, and Emily Uhlenkott
